committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: An act to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to determine the suitability and feasibility of designating the Fox and Lower Wisconsin River Corridor in the State of Wisconsin as a National Heritage Corridor, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fox-Wisconsin River National Heritage Corridor Study Act of 1992

summary.text: Fox-Wisconsin River National Heritage Corridor Study Act of 1992 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to submit to certain congressional committees a study on the suitability and feasibility of designating the Fox and Lower Wisconsin River Corridors in the State of Wisconsin as a National Heritage Corridor. Establishes the Fox-Wisconsin River Study Advisory Commission to advise the Secretary in the preparation of such study. Directs the Commission to report annually to the Secretary and the governor of the State of Wisconsin. Terminates the Commission upon submission of the feasibility study. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Fox River National Heritage Corridor Act of 1991
Fox-Wisconsin River National Heritage Corridor Study Act of 1992
Fox-Wisconsin River National Heritage Corridor Study Act of 1992
A bill to establish the Fox River National Heritage Corridor in Wisconsin, and for other purposes.

An act to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to determine the suitability and feasibility of designating the Fox and Lower Wisconsin River Corridor in the State of Wisconsin as a National Heritage Corridor, and for other purposes.
